title: Eco Actions
subtitle: Join our community-driven ecological events and make a real impact in Uzbekistan. Together, we transform waste into valuable resources and create a cleaner environment for future generations.
noEventsFoundDescription: Try adjusting your filters or search terms
whyJoinOurEcoActionsDesc: ZAMINAT.eco organizes meaningful environmental events that create lasting impact while building a stronger, more sustainable community.
communityImpactDesc: Join thousands of eco-warriors making real environmental change in Uzbekistan through organized community actions.
sustainableFutureDesc: Every action contributes to building a sustainable future through plastic recycling, tree planting, and environmental education.
earnEcoPointsDesc: Get rewarded for your environmental contributions.
meetLikeMindedPeopleDesc: Connect with passionate environmentalists, learn new skills, and build lasting friendships while protecting our planet.

schoolWorkshop.title: Environmental Education Workshop at School #45
schoolWorkshop.description: Interactive workshop teaching children about plastic recycling, waste management, and environmental protection through fun activities and games.
schoolWorkshop.requirements: Basic knowledge of environmental issues, enthusiasm for teaching children
schoolWorkshop.whatToBring: Notebook, pen, comfortable clothing, water bottle
schoolWorkshop.benefits: Teaching experience, community impact, networking with educators
schoolWorkshop.impact: Educate 100+ children about environmental protection and sustainable practices

treePlanting.title: Community Tree Planting Initiative
treePlanting.description: Join us in planting native trees in Tashkent Central Park to improve air quality and create green spaces for future generations.
treePlanting.requirements: Physical fitness for outdoor work, commitment to environmental protection
treePlanting.whatToBring: Work gloves, comfortable shoes, hat, sunscreen, water bottle
treePlanting.benefits: Physical exercise, environmental contribution, community building
treePlanting.impact: Plant 200+ trees, improve air quality for thousands of residents

riverCleanup.title: Chirchiq River Cleanup Campaign
riverCleanup.description: Help clean the Chirchiq River banks from plastic waste and debris while learning about water ecosystem protection.
riverCleanup.requirements: Willingness to work outdoors, basic physical fitness
riverCleanup.whatToBring: Old clothes, rubber boots, gloves, water bottle, snacks
riverCleanup.benefits: Environmental awareness, team building, outdoor activity
riverCleanup.impact: Clean 2km of riverbank, remove 500kg+ of waste from water ecosystem

plasticRecycling.title: Plastic Recycling Drive
plasticRecycling.description: Collect and sort plastic waste from neighborhoods for proper recycling into eco-tiles and construction materials.
plasticRecycling.requirements: Basic sorting skills, attention to detail
plasticRecycling.benefits: Learn recycling processes, contribute to circular economy
plasticRecycling.impact: Process 300kg+ plastic waste into valuable eco-products

awarenessWalk.title: Environmental Awareness Walk
awarenessWalk.description: Peaceful walk through Tashkent promoting environmental consciousness and sustainable living practices.
awarenessWalk.requirements: Enthusiasm for environmental causes, comfortable walking
awarenessWalk.whatToBring: Comfortable walking shoes, water bottle, eco-friendly signs (optional)
awarenessWalk.benefits: Raise public awareness, peaceful activism, community solidarity
awarenessWalk.impact: Reach 1000+ people with environmental messages, inspire sustainable living

wasteAudit.title: Community Waste Audit Project
wasteAudit.description: Comprehensive analysis of waste generation patterns in residential areas to develop better recycling strategies.
wasteAudit.requirements: Data collection skills, analytical thinking, environmental science background preferred
wasteAudit.whatToBring: Notebook, calculator, measuring tools, protective equipment
wasteAudit.benefits: Research experience, data analysis skills, scientific contribution
wasteAudit.impact: Generate actionable data for improving community recycling programs

createActionDescription: Have an eco-project idea? Create your own community action and invite others to join.
cleanupEvents: Cleanup Events: Remove waste from public spaces and natural areas
treePlantingEvents: Tree Planting: Plant trees and create green spaces in urban areas
educationEvents: Education: Teach communities about environmental protection
recyclingEvents: Recycling: Organize waste collection and sorting activities
awarenessEvents: Awareness: Spread environmental consciousness through community outreach
meetCommunity: Meet Community: Connect with like-minded eco-activists
learnSkills: Learn Skills: Gain knowledge about sustainability and environmental protection
makeImpact: Make Impact: See the direct results of your environmental efforts
buildResume: Build Resume: Add volunteer experience to your profile
getInvolvedDescription: Join our next eco-action and help build a sustainable future for Uzbekistan through community participation.
